content.query:
-- DELETE from [dbo].[FactSales];

select *  FROM [dbo].[FactSales]
select *  FROM [dbo].DimCustomer
select count(*) FROM [dbo].DimProduct

select * from [dbo].[DimProduct_SK]

-- delete from [dbo].[DimCustomer_SK];
select top(500) * from [dbo].[DimCustomer_SK] ORDER by customerSk asc
